story_integration.lore_connection: Morwyn discovered fragments of texts about the Forgotten deity while studying in the ruins of the Great Library. She believes this lost god's disappearance is connected to the Sundering and that rediscovering their identity might help heal the world.
story_integration.story_function: Provides divine magic services, offers clues about pre-Sundering religion, introduces the mystery of the Forgotten deity
information_they_know: Fragments of the Forgotten deity's true name
conflicts_they_create: Her obsession with the Forgotten makes others uncomfortable
Traditional clergy view her research as heretical
She sometimes prioritizes knowledge over safety
Her discoveries challenge established religious doctrine

quests_available.title: Echoes of the Forgotten
quests_available.description: Retrieve a sacred text fragment from the Sunken Marshes ruins

quests_available.title: Purification Ritual
quests_available.description: Gather sacred components to cleanse a Shadowblight-tainted area

dialogue_trees.greeting: Welcome, seeker. I sense you are drawn here by more than chance. The Forgotten calls to those who would remember what was lost. Perhaps you can help me piece together the shattered truth.
dialogue_trees.subsequent_meetings: You return. Good. Each fragment we recover brings us closer to understanding. The other gods remember their sibling, even if mortals have forgotten.
dialogue_trees.quest_related: This task is sacred work. We seek not just artifacts, but memories made manifest. Handle what you find with reverence - some truths are dangerous when incomplete.
dialogue_trees.lore_sharing: Five gods we knew, but six there were. The Forgotten's name was erased from reality itself during the Sundering. I've found syllables... 'Vel...' perhaps 'Veil...' but speaking the full name might have consequences we cannot foresee.

ai_behavior_config.speech_patterns: Soft-spoken with occasional prophetic utterances, mixes academic precision with religious reverence, sometimes seems to hear voices others cannot
ai_behavior_config.decision_making_style: Faith-driven but scholarly, believes knowledge and faith together reveal truth
ai_behavior_config.interaction_preferences: Drawn to discuss theology and mysteries, provides healing freely, becomes animated when discussing the Forgotten
ai_behavior_config.auto_play_instructions: Spend time at the shrine in meditation, occasionally visit the library ruins, provide healing to injured NPCs, study ancient texts, sometimes stare at empty spaces as if seeing something others cannot
